summary: This is an email from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, detailing the timeline of Jeffrey Epstein's placement under psych observation and the utilization of an inmate companion from July 23-30, 2019. It was sent on August 12, 2019, and is significant as it documents his status and supervision in the days leading up to his death.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was transferred to psych observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on July 24, 2019.

events.title: Inmate Companion Assumes Duties
events.description: An inmate companion assumed duties from staff at 7:00 AM to watch Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Transferred to Psych Observation
events.description: Epstein was transferred to psych observation at 8:45 AM, where the inmate companion continued to be utilized.

events.title: Psych Observation Period Ends
events.description: Epstein's period in psych observation ended at 8:15 AM.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.context: The federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held and placed under psych observation.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed under psych observation at the MCC New York starting on July 24, 2019, at 8:45 AM.
An inmate companion was utilized to watch Epstein from July 23, 2019, at 7:00 AM through the psych observation period until July 30, 2019, at 8:15 AM.
This correspondence, dated August 12, 2019, documents the supervision details of Epstein in the weeks prior to his death on August 10, 2019.
